508020.name: Robotpencil Presents: Alien Portrait Demo
508020.description:
In this video tutorial, I'll cover how to go about an interesting creature/alien/monster portrait. The topics I'll cover are:

  • Go wild with the shapes
  • Push anatomy and features
  • Don't be afraid of mistakes use them
508020.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
